channel.title: Sites that are shitty
channel.description: I have been spending a lot of time on the World Wide Web and I have stumbled upon a few ugly websites. The most ugly of them so far is [Malware Wiki](http://malware.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page). This thread is mainly about us sharing and laughing and cringing at how ugly these sites are, both at the UI and at the source code level.

item.title: Sites that are shitty
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Sites that are shitty
item.dc:creator: EternalEclipse
item.description:
GeoCities is what you’re looking for. Yahoo has taken it down, but a bunch of people, namely the Archive Team, managed to crawl, download and share it on TPB. If you don’t wanna download a 900GB Torrent and you’re just looking for some nostalgia, Google Images would probably be a good alternative.

Read full topic

item.title: Sites that are shitty

item.description:
I recently came accross this site, http://www.evil.com/. Im still not sure what it is all about, but the UI reminds me of early 2000’s webpages.
